good morning! my FRC team is heaving problems with our swerve MK4i. When we will play and drive, he walk crookely. We don’t are moving the joysticks of angle, just the drive in up direction. We suspect of pigeon problem. What can do this? sorry by my english, i’m brazilian

Swerve walking crookely Java
